long_description: The GT Avalanche Comp women's hardtail mountain bike boasts a shock-absorbent fork and powerful hydraulic disc brakes so you get to enjoy a cushy ride while attacking tough trails. Aluminum frame features triple-butted, hydroformed top, down and seat tubes for improved strength and reduced weight. SR Suntour XCM suspension fork features 100mm travel and a softer spring that's tuned for women. Drivetrain features intuitive Shimano trigger shifters and a Shimano Deore rear derailleur for quick, precise shifts through the 27 gear combinations. ProMax Decipher hydraulic disc brakes ensure you have the stopping power and speed management you need, no matter the conditions. Continental Race King tires supply good all-around traction for varied trails. Specs on the GT Avalanche Comp women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
